activation_details: After Russian forces invaded in late February, SIMS was activated to provide remote and deployed support.
Iraq RC requested some support, and IFRC Geneva approved activation of SIMS.

emergency_name: Democratic Republic of Congo Hunger Crisis
activation_details: We were requested to provide support remotely for the preparation for the lean season in 2022.

emergency_name: Democratic Republic of Congo Population Movement
activation_details: Testing remote support for information management.
One FACT IM deployment to support the operation.
Typhoon Haiyan represented the largest SIMS activation to date. The team produced more than 500 maps, templates for factsheets, and summarized all ERU data via new reporting processes.
SIMS provided satellite imagery.
Supported the operation with malnutrition maps.
Deployed two rounds of support. Supported with graphics for logistics team and satellite imagery analysis.
Supported the cash program with maps for one month, provided imagery analysis and displacement mapping.
Provided mapping and data management support.
SIMS provided over six months of support and produced hundreds of maps.
Provided remote support with mapping and infographics.

Provided remote support with the production of maps for the operation.
SIMS provided both remote and deployed support to the earthquake response. Dozens of products, including maps, infographics, mobile data support, and more were provided.
SIMS provided remote and deployed support to the cyclone response.
SIMS provided remote support to the operation.
SIMS provided support through the shelter cluster.
SIMS provided both remote and deployed support to the Philippines Red Cross.

One regional deployment to support the Latin America and Caribbean team.

Provided operation with both deployed and remote support.

Provided support to MSM40 and MSM20.

Multiple emergencies, including the Sulawesi, Lombok, and Sunda Straits earthquakes, were merged into a single response. SIMS provided remote and deployed support across several parts of the operation.

emergency_name: Democratic Republic of Congo Ebola Outbreak
activation_details: SIMS responded to the 9th and 10th EVD outbreak in the Democratic Republic of Congo with both remote and deployed support.
SIMS deployed IM specialists to support this response as well as several other concurrent operations going on at the same time in the country.
SIMS provided remote and deployed support to the operation.
SIMS provided a massive level of support through multiple rounds of both deployed and remote support.
SIMS provided a massive level of support through both remote and deployed IM specialists across multiple rounds and profiles.
SIMS provided a regional FACT IM coordinator, based in Panama, to support the emergency response.
SIMS provided remote and deployed support to the operation, based in Panama but roving throughout the Americas region.
SIMS provided formal, dedicated support to the response at both the global and regional levels with a variety of products and services.
SIMS provided dedicated remote support.

emergency_name: Central America Hurricanes Eta and Iota
activation_details: SIMS provided remote support to multiple countries covered by the emergency appeal.

emergency_name: Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda Volcanic Eruption
activation_details: SIMS provided remote support for the assessment cell.
